virophage.core

Class Virus

  • java.lang.Object
    • virophage.core.Virus
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Virus
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A Virus represents an occupant of a cell that belongs to a player and has a given amount of energy.
    Since:
    2014-05-6
    Author:
    Max Ovsiankin, Leon Ren
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Virus(Player player, int energy)
      Constructs a virus belonging to a certain player containing a given amount of energy.

        energy - The initial energy of this virus
